#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int findZero(int n)
{
	int m=5,k=0,y;
	y=n;
	while((y/5)!=0)
	{
		k=k+(y/m);
		y=y/5;
    }
	return k;
}
int main()
{
	int n,t,sum,x,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		//printf("n=%d\n",n);
		if(n<5)
		printf("0\n");
		else
		if(n==5)
		printf("5\n");
		else
		{
		x=n*findZero(n);
		//cout<<"x="<<findZero(n)<<endl;
		for(i=n-1;i>=5;i--)
		{
			//cout<<"findzerofor"<<i<<"="<<findZero(i)<<endl;
			sum+=findZero(i);
		}
		//cout<<"x="<<x<<" sum="<<sum<<endl;
		printf("%d\n",x-sum);
	    }
	}
}
